sentences.sContent: A disposable electrocardiogram machine the size of a Band-Aid monitors a heart patient.
sentences.sContent_eng: A disposable electrocardiogram machine the size of a Band-Aid monitors a heart patient.
sentences.sCn: 一个邦迪大小的一次性心电图仪器监视着一个心脏病人。

sentences.sContent: Some countries, such as Italy and Japan, screen young people with the use of an electrocardiogram (ECG, or EKG), which records the electrical signals present in the heart.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some countries, such as Italy and Japan, screen young people with the use of an electrocardiogram (ECG, or EKG), which records the electrical signals present in the heart.
sentences.sCn: 一些其他的国家，比如意大利和日本，人们用心电图（ECG或EKG）给年轻人做检查，心电图记录了心脏发出的电信号。

words.tran: 心电图描记的（electrocardiograph的形容词）
